name: Foghorn
description:
Foghorn is a multiplayer horror game concept / prototype about a group of survivors shipwrecked on a mysterious island. They find the island engulfed by dense fog and a haunting humanoid figure tracking them down...

CONTENT WARNING: bright lights, light gore

*NOTE:

the current version of foghorn is the scaled down version of a game concept that i, personally, really adore. one day i will finish the full version, probably ; /

-steve
